words: Ben  ga  na - egwu mmiri  (ugbua).
gloss: Ben        MOD         hab - swim    water         now
translation: Ben must be swimming (right now).
comment: ga is the future marker which presumably has a modal meaning and is therefore glossed as MOD. ga is the future marker which presumably has a modal meaning and is therefore glossed as MOD, ga and riri both seem to contribute to the necessity meaning.

translation: Ben must be swimming (right now).
comment: riri optional, but preferred
